tutorialNaviM.message:
[ffffff]The place where all data ends up
when it's no longer in use is...

The Digital World.[-]

[ffffff]The lifeforms that dwell in this world are called...

Digital Monsters.[-]

[ffffff]The app that links the Digital World,
and the real world,
is known as Digimon Links.[-]
[ffffff]And now, everything is connected...[-]

Welcome to [ffd700]Digimon Links[-]!
I'm your friendly guide, Hina.

I'm so excited to invite you to the [ffd700]Digital
World[-], the world where Digimon live!

Let's register you as a user!
Please input your name.

$USER_INPUT_NAME$? I see!
I'll get you registered right away.
All done! Now, let's get going to the Digital World!

You'll be able to see it any minute now!
The Digital World, where Digimon live!
Welcome to the Digital World!

This is the world where Digimon live,
so everything here is composed of data.

Actually, it has continents and oceans,
just like the real world!

W-What...?! What's going on?!
T-The Digital World is...

This... This is awful! Something
made a tremendous noise and the
Digital World started to fragment!
I've got to find some way to stop the fragmentation!
Nngh... It's no use! It just won't stop!

I'm really sorry, but I need to borrow your
device to use as a quarantine zone!

Backing up Digimon Links...
Reconfiguring program...compiling...
Yes! It worked!
Activate!!
...lease...
...n you...hear me...?

...$USER_INPUT_NAME$!
Please, answer me!
Thank goodness! It looks like the signal has been restored!

Phew...and it looks like I managed to
successfully back up the Farm...

Oh! And your Digimon are safe, too!
Thank goodness!

That strange phenomenon just now...
All the data in the Digital World
disintegrated into fragmented [ffd700]Clusters[-].

It looks like the Digital World is
on its way to deletion...

If we want to save it, we'll have
to work together with the Digimon
to gather lots of [ffd700]Clusters[-].

Let's train some Digimon and join forces
with them to gather those [ffd700]Clusters[-]!

It'll be okay!
I'll always be here to help you out!

Now, let's make this [ffd700]Farm[-]
our home base for our
mission to save the Digital World!

The [ffd700]Farm[-] is primarily a place
for raising and training Digimon.

There are lots of different [ffd700]Facilities[-]
to help you train your Digimon, but...

You don't have a Digimon to
be your partner yet, do you?

First, let's summon a Digimon
using a [ffd700]Link Capture[-]!

I'll give you the [ffd700]Link Points[-]
you'll need as a present.

Here, you can perform [ffd700]Captures[-]
to summon Digimon.

For now, let's use a [ffd700]Link Capture[-]
to summon an In-Training Digimon!

You can check here to see how many
Link Points you have right now.

The Link Points I just gave you
are currently displayed, see?
Now, please tap [ffd700]Capture[-].
You've made friends with a new Digimon!

Now that you've got a Digimon friend,
let's train them in a [ffd700]Facility[-]!

Look at this Facility, please.
This is the [ffd700]Lab[-].

It's a Facility for raising [ffd700]In-Training[-] Digimon
and training stronger Digimon.

Now, let's go over the features of the [ffd700]Garden[-]
where you can raise [ffd700]In-Training[-] Digimon.

Just now, I sent the Digimon you
befriended with that [ffd700]Link Capture[-]
to your [ffd700]Garden[-].
Let's go see how it's doing!

This is your [ffd700]Garden[-]. There aren't
any Digimon being raised here yet.

To start raising one, let's select a Digimon
from your [ffd700]List[-] and transfer it here.
Please tap the Digimon's icon.
You transferred the Digimon to your Garden!

As time passes, the Digimon here
will grow and Digivolve.

It usually takes a long time, but
this time, let's use [ffd700]DigiStones[-]
to Digivolve it right away!
Your Digimon Digivolved into a [ffd700]Rookie[-]!

I think you guys are ready to
face the [ffd700]dangers[-] of going [ffd700]Exploring[-] now.
Let's go gather up that scattered data!

Something strange is happening near the
Farm! Let's go check it out!

It looks like something strange has
happened to those Digimon due to
the effects of the fragmentation...

We've got to [ffd700]battle[-] them to
put a stop to their rampage!
Now, let's study the basics of [ffd700]battle[-].

A [ffd700]battle[-] is a turn-based conflict
fought with a party of three Digimon.
This is your current [ffd700]Party[-].

You can tap and hold a Digimon's icon
to view its status, so make sure to check that out later!
Next, I'll explain commands.
Next, I'll explain about status.
First, let's try a Normal Attack!

After tapping the [ffd700]ATTACK[-] button, 
you can then activate your attack 
by tapping [ffd700]GO![-].

Wow, you really did some damage!
When you've reduced all enemies' [ffd700]HP[-] to [ffd700]0[-], you [ffd700]win the battle[-]!
Next, let's try activating some Skills!

First, we have to decide which Skill,
so let's check out their effects.
Please [ffd700]tap and hold[-] a Skill button.
This displays information about the Skill!

When you want to check the
power and effects of a Skill
[ffd700]tap and hold[-] the Skill button.
Now, let's try activating a Skill!
Huh?! They took out Tentomon?!

Tentomon's icon turned gray, right?
Try tapping it.

You can revive Digimon at the start of the
next [ffd700]Round[-] by using DigiStones!

Please use some of my DigiStones
for now!
Let's try harder next time so they won't beat us! Time for another attack!

Now you've got it!
Go ahead and try attacking on your own!

You did it!
You fought in perfect harmony with your Digimon!

When you win a battle,
you can earn [ffd700]EXP[-] and [ffd700]Digivolution fuel[-].

When you earn enough EXP to [ffd700]max out[-]
your Digimon's level, you can Digivolve
them with fuel and Clusters!

Great job!
You and your Digimon make a
powerful team!

Lastly, here are some DigiStones
as a thank-you present!

You can also use DigiStones
to capture Digimon!
Let's try a [ffd700]Rare Capture[-].

With [ffd700]Rare Captures[-], you can summon
more powerful Digimon above Rookie level!
Now, let's capture a Digimon!
You've made friends with a powerful new Digimon!

I think that pretty much covers the basics
you'll need to know to restore the Digital World.

Let's join forces with your Digimon
and save the Digital World!

Last but not least, let's check out
how to train Digimon!

Huh?! Oh, no! If this keeps up,
it'll break our connection!
Is this another result of the fragmentation?

For some reason, the link between
the Digital World and your world has weakened...

I'm going to hurry up and install the
necessary data! Please wait a minute!

It'll be okay!
I'm always prepared, after all!

I'll see you when the install is finished!
Just hold on for a minute, please!

When Digimon become [ffd700]Rookies[-],
they can participate in battle.

Here, have two more party members
as a present from me!

When they Digivolve into [ffd700]Rookies[-] in your Garden,
Digimon are transferred to your [ffd700]House[-].

Remember: DigiEggs and In-Training Digimon stay in the Garden,
Rookies and up stay in the House!

If you want to help your Digimon grow
quickly, [ffd700]Meat[-] is the easiest option.
You can harvest Meat from a [ffd700]Meat Field[-]!

Your Meat Field is under construction,
but please [ffd700]tap[-] the Facility to put on the finishing touches.

Your Meat Field is complete!
Now let's try harvesting some Meat.

You did it!
You can harvest more Meat as time passes. Be sure to harvest it frequently!

You can give your harvested Meat
to your Digimon by [ffd700]Feeding[-] them.

When Feeding your Digimon, you can
earn EXP by giving them Meat.

If you give them lots of Meat, you'll
be able to level them up!

This is where you can raise the level of
your Digimon and [ffd700]Enhance[-] them!

Do a lot of [ffd700]Enhancement[-]
to make your Digimon stronger!

This is where you can
[ffd700]Enhance[-] your Digimon!

When you [ffd700]Enhance[-] a Digimon,
you can give a boost to
that Digimon's status!
In [ffd700]Party Formation[-], you can swap out the party of Digimon who join you on Quests!

I'll bet you could gain the upper hand in battle
by building a party with the right Skills and Resistances!

You can use [ffd700]Legacies[-] to pass down
Legacy Skills from Digimon to Digimon!

Turn the tide of battle by passing down
Legacy Skills that restore or support your party
or are strong against Bosses.

With [ffd700]Research[-], you can cross [ffd700]two Megas[-]
to create a [ffd700]DigiEgg[-].

The [ffd700]DigiEgg[-] you create
will inherit the [ffd700]Ability[-], or strongest ability,
of the Base Digimon!

When you conduct Research after [ffd700]maxing out[-] your Friendship,
the Base Digimon will be [ffd700]Awakened[-]!

Before you go on a Quest,
I'll explain about the [ffd700]Resistances[-] of different Digimon!

To gain the upper hand in battle,
you'll need a really good grasp of this concept!

You can change your User Name here.
Your User Code is used to search for Friends
and transfer your game.

The leader of your Favorite party
is also displayed here.

With [ffd700]Resistance Upgrades[-],you can
combine Digimon with the same name
to strengthen their Resistance!

The upgraded Resistance is random
so you can change the upgraded Resistance
every time you Upgrade!

Beef up the right Resistances for the boss
you want to beat to gain the upper hand in battle!

Last but not least! The Digimon
selected in your [ffd700]Favorite[-] party
will appear on your Farm!
This is where you can purchase [ffd700]Facilities[-].

Let's construct Facilities that'll help train your
Digimon and plan an optimal training regimen!

When [ffd700]Feeding[-] your Digimon, you can
earn EXP by giving them Meat.

If you give them lots of Meat, you'll
be able to level them up!

You can harvest meat from your [ffd700]Meat Fields[-].
Let's try harvesting some to give to your Digimon!
When you don't have enough Digivolution fuel, try going out Exploring to gather more!
I restored the DigiChat feature that lets you communicate with other users!
There are other users besides us who are fighting back against this crisis in the Digital World.
Please use DigiChat to exchange useful information like strategies to stop all these enraged Digimon!
Thanks to you, the Digital World is being restored and the Colosseum has been unlocked! Go and test your strength!
You can make the most of the Colosseum by facing off with other users and Digimon to polish your skills.
Let's all have fun getting stronger together in the Colosseum!

You can use Chip Installation to install the
Chips in your possession to various Digimon.
By installing the right Chips for your strategy, you can make a big difference in battle!

It's not just about installing Chips, either!
You can also expand the number of installation slots!
You can increase the number of chips that can be installed by Digivolving Digimon and raising their awakening level through research!
Also, it can be increased even more by using the Expansion Patch. Try using them for your Digimon when you get them.
Enhancing Chips can powerfully boost their effects!
Enhance your Chips and use them to make your favorite Digimon even stronger!
A [ffd700]Chip[-] is an item that has various effects when installed to a Digimon.
This is where you can check which Chips you currently have.
Check out the effects of each Chip, and consider different strategies for using it!
All sorts of Quests are displayed here! Some are always available and some are limited-time-only.
Your Digimon are still growing so I recommend doing Quests to earn useful items for training them!
First, let's try a [ffd700]Normal Quest[-] which helps you gain EXP and Friendship and a [ffd700]Daily Quest[-] which helps you gain Digivolution fuel!
The [ffd700]Advent Quests[-] that are currently open are displayed here.
In these Quests, you can gather fuel to Digivolve into powerful Digimon called [ffd700]Megas[-]!
However, my data indicates that you'll face very powerful Digimon in these Quests...
If you haven't cleared the [ffd700]Intro Advent Quests[-] or Digivolved a Mega yet, I recommend starting there!
This is the area for [ffd700]Intro Advent Quests[-].
Like [ffd700]Advent Quests[-], these are Quests that help you gain the fuel you need to Digivolve your Digimon into their powerful [ffd700]Mega[-] forms. However...
Since they're "Intro" Advent Quests, they feature less powerful Digimon and are easier to clear!
If you've gotten as far as Digivolving an [ffd700]Ultimate[-], but Advent Quests are still too hard, try an Intro first!
I've got a few words of helpful advice noted down for lots of these Quests, so please check them out!
This is where you can earn the fuel you'll need to Digivolve your Digimon.
It may be called "Digivolution fuel," but it has lots of other uses too, so you'll need plenty of it!
If you find yourself short on fuel, give one of these [ffd700]Daily Quests[-] a try!

Congratulations!
You've cleared all the Beginner Missions!
You and your Digimon show so much promise! The way you work together is really touching.

Well, I think that about covers the basics
of training and battle!
I've taught you all the pointers I can.Now the student has become the master, haha!
I guess all that's left to say is... Let's work hard together to restore the Digital World!
Guess what?! I've put together some new Missions for you!
I call them "[ffd700]Beginner Missions[-]"!
I know what you're thinking... You don't consider yourself a "beginner" anymore, right?

But, look! If you clear them, you'll earn rewards
just like the other Missions you've done!
They're all tasks you'll naturally clear as you keep on training and battling, so please give them a try!

With [ffd700]Ability Seeding[-],
you can hybridize multiple Digimon
to pass on or enhance their [ffd700]Ability[-].

With [ffd700]Version Upgrades[-], you can make
+4 Awakened [ffd700]Digimon[-] that are already
at their max level even stronger!

A Version Upgraded Digimon can
inherit two Legacy Skills, and
its max level gets a boost, too!

And that's not all!
When you do Resistance Upgrades in the Dojo, you can assign Resistance to Status Effects!
Version Upgrades and Resistance Upgrades are powerful, but you'll need special items to do either one...

Besides Digivolution Fragments and Plugins,
you'll also need Upgrade Data for Version Upgrades...
...and for Status Effect Resistance Upgrades, you'll need Re-factors.
The conditions may be steep, but Version Upgrades are sure to make your Digimon even stronger!
So reach for the stars, and be sure to do some Version Upgrades!
The results are in for my analysis of that Digimon sheltering in the volcano!
Its name is Vorvomon!
Isn't that an adorable name?!
And it looks like it might have a hidden ability to Digivolve into Volcanicdramon!
If you help it Digivolve, I could probably analyze it even further than I already have!
But...
It seems like a very special Digivolution, so it'll need specialized training to Digivolve that way.
But it'll repay you by becoming a courageous Digimon with powers unlike any other!
Please do your best to train it well!
I've compiled my report, so please give it a look right away.
I'm counting on you!

In the [ffd700]Exchange[-], you can trade in
the items you've earned for other items.

You can snag valuable items,
so check it out regularly!
Some Exchanges are only open for a limited time. Don't forget to trade in your items!
This is where you can friend other users who are also fighting this crisis in the Digital World.

You can check on your friend requests here!
Remember to check them often!

This is where you can view your Missions.
If you complete [ffd700]Missions[-], you can earn prizes!
By training your Digimon and making progress in battle, you can pick up lots of valuable items!

If you're ever unsure what to do next,
just look here!

As time passes in the [ffd700]Garden[-],
your In-Training Digimon will grow and Digivolve.

In-Training Digimon can't enter battle,
so train them here until
they become Rookies!

This is the [ffd700]Recruitment Board[-],
where you can view Co-Op recruitment notices.
Participating in Co-Op battles has many benefits, such as not costing you any Stamina!
Let's all work together to fight this crisis in the Digital World!

You can check out Digivolution routes on
the [ffd700]Digivolution Chart[-]!

If you're hoping to Digivolve a favorite Digimon,
find their Digivolution route here!
If you haven't Digivolved a Mega yet, I recommend going on Quests that drop the items you'll need to train one!

You can check which Digimon you have or
[ffd700]release[-] Digimon here in the List.

It's not easy to say goodbye,
but they'll leave a parting gift of Clusters
or data fragments if you release a Mega.

When you need data fragments
or your House is full,
it might be time to think about parting ways.

First, [ffd700]Explore[-] to earn EXP and
Clusters to train your Digimon!

Tap [ffd700]Explore[-]
and try doing a Quest!

The Digimon you encounter while Exploring
will get stronger and stronger.

If you find yourself struggling in battle,
try Digivolving your Digimon!

Please tap [ffd700]Digivolve[-]
on your [ffd700]Digivice[-].
Thanks for waiting! I've stabilized the connection with the expansion data and everything seems to be in order!
Let's work hard together to restore the Digital World!
At least, that's what I'd like to say... But I'll bet you hardly even know where to start.
That's why I've made you a list of things that ought to get done first!

I call it, "[ffd700]Beginner Missions[-]"!
Please tap Missions.
These are all things that will be crucial as you keep on training and battling with your Digimon.
If you clear them all, you and your Digimon will definitely level up!
If you're ever unsure what to do next, please come check out these Beginner Missions, okay?
Oh! You got a [ffd700]Chip[-]!
Chips are items that have all sorts of effects when installed to a Digimon!
You can check which Chips you have and install them to Digimon at your [ffd700]Chip Factory[-].
If you haven't constructed a Chip Factory yet, go to [ffd700]Facilities[-] and then select the [ffd700]Shop[-] to get one!
Now, let's go back to your Farm and go Exploring!
Please tap Explore.

You can check which Digimon you have or
[ffd700]release[-] Digimon here in the List.

It's not easy to say goodbye,
but they'll leave a parting gift of Clusters
or data fragments if you release a Mega.

When you need data fragments
or your House is full,
it might be time to think about parting ways.

It looks like you can construct a Warehouse now!
Let's go construct one, quick!

It looks like you can construct a Dojo now!
Let's go construct one, quick!

It looks like you can construct a Restaurant now!
Let's go construct one, quick!

It looks like you can construct a Chip Factory now!
Let's go construct one, quick!

Digivolving your Digimon will make them
even stronger than they are now!

Enhancing your Digimon will make them
level up and get even stronger!

Resistance Upgrades will increase
a useful Resistance by 1!
Legacies can grant your favorite Legacy Skills to a particular Digimon!

Passing down Abilitys can boost the
parameters of the Ability!

Awakening your Digimon gives all of their
stats a boost!

Great job! Thanks to your hard work gathering [ffd700]Clusters[-],
the Digital World is being restored.

You've restored the DigiChat, Co-Op mode, and the Colosseum
and got the new Chip System running.

The restoration is going so well, and it's all thanks to
the bond between you and your Digimon!
Thank you so much for everything you've done!
You've fought off so many wild Digimon, too! At this rate, everything will be fixed in no time!
But... There is one thing that worries me...
For some reason, the fragmentation in one area seems to be getting worse.

I've got a bad feeling about this...
I hope it's nothing, but...
W-What?! What in the world is going on?!

It looks like the alert stopped...
Let's go find out what happened!

Location of error outbreak detected... Finding coordinates...
 Yes... Analysis results... Complete!
It's...a fragmentation reaction on a scale unlike anything I've ever seen!

I'm picking up readings from an unidentified Digimon!
They're coming from deep beneath the Digital World!

This will require an investigation...
We've got to gather more information!

I'm sorry, but could you please go down there
to investigate and gather clues for me?

It'll be okay!
I'll always be here to help you out, after all!
I'm not sure what's down there, though, so please be careful!

Hello...? Can you hear me...?
You're going farther down...so...the signal is...breaking...up...

Tha...nks to you and...your Digi...mon,
I'm getting...lots of da...ta on the und...erground Digimon!
I think I...can get an underg...round i...mage...
I'll s...end it...to y...ou no...w!
Acti...vate!
There's th...e image...!
This m...ust be a...layer of magma...
It seem...s to be...some sort of...deep sub...terranean c...ave...
Huh...?! The...tempera...ture readings...in that cave a...re astronom...ical!
What k...ind of Digi...mon could surv...ive in such...incredible heat...?
It m...ust be str...onger against fire...than any Digim...on I've...ever seen...
Than...ks for ga...thering data f...or me... Please, kee...p up the...good w...ork!
N...ow, if I...can ju...st configure this...
There! The connection should be stable now!

Thanks to the data you gathered,
I managed to pinpoint the location of the underground Digimon.
I'm gradually working out the level of its strength, too...
As I thought, it's incredibly strong against Fire, so that might not work against it at all.

It seems to have incredible power
and it might be able to use its Signature and Legacy Skills serially.
If you end up having to fight it, it could be extremely fierce...

Huh?! A Digimon appeared?!
This location... It must be the underground Digimon!
I'll display an image!

What...is it?!
What in the world is that Digimon?!

It doesn't seem to be any Digimon in our records to date...
...[ffd700]Volcanicdramon[-]?

The level where it appeared is very close to you!
Let's go find it! Get ready!
The signal from Volcanicdramon is fading away...
It must have moved to another location somehow.

Volcanicdramon...
What a powerful Digimon that was.

You managed to fight it off safely this time,
but it was a close battle.

When its wounds have healed,
it'll probably rear its head again...
Plus, the effects of what just happened are causing a lot of worrying signals in several locations.
I'll bet there's a fresh batch of rampaging Digimon and strange phenomena occurring out there.

But it'll be okay! I'm still here
to help you out, just like I've always been!

Please, keep on working with me to restore the Digital World!
I'm counting on you!

I wanted to talk to you about something...
Is now a good time?
You might have noticed this too, $USER_INPUT_NAME$, but doesn't it seem like there have been a lot of powerful Digimon on the rampage lately?

That's why I did a little independent investigation.
And when I did...
I was able to prove that the rate of outbreaks is rising, especially around the place where we fought Volcanicdramon before.
I've identified a data anomaly at the center of the outbreaks, but it doesn't seem to be fragmentation...
I can't find out any more than that without checking it out firsthand.
...$USER_INPUT_NAME$, could you please help me investigate this?
You will? Really? Thank you so much!
In that case, I'll be your guide, so go get ready to head out and let me know when you're all set!
It has been a while since last time we came to this volcano...
Okay, could you please go down there and gather some clues for me?
I'll be right here to help you out, as always!
Alright! Last time, our signal was awfully unstable, but it should be... fine... thi...s... time...
Tha...t's stra...nge... I thou...ght I'd solved... the prob...lem last... time...
I'll ana...lyze it and f...ix it right now, s...o give... me just a... min...ute...!

I thi...nk I... understand... the cause...
Now if I... can j...ust reconfi...gure... these settings...
Acti...vate!
There! That should take care of it!
Something down there seems to be generating a tremendous amount of noise, which was interfering with our signal.
But what in the Digital World would produce so much noise...?
Something unbelievable must be waiting for us up ahead... Please, be careful!
The data signal just got even stronger!
It's just a little further to the site of our encounter with Volcanicdramon.
Please, be extra careful!
At first glance, it doesn't look like anything has changed since we were last here.
Oh! That's...!
It seems to be an incredible quantity of data...
This could help us figure out why the Digimon have been going so wild...
I'd like to try analyzing it, so could you please bring it back up to me?
All of a sudden, the wild Digimon are...!?
Looks like we've got no choice! I'll back you up, so please get ready for battle!
Phew... Looks like we made it...
Is that data you found earlier still safe?
Oh! Thank goodness! It seems to be safe...
Okay, I'd like to analyze it, so try to bring it back to me this time...
Huh?? What?!? The data suddenly started multiplying!?
Eeeek!!
Is that... a Digimon?!? That's impossible, it can't be...
But...
Hmm...
No... well, in any case, if I examine this little guy... hmm... oh, I see...
Oh, I'm sorry! I got a little lost in thought, there...
$USER_INPUT_NAME$, could you please take care of it, and take it back with you?
If I examine it, I might be able to figure out some things about the Digimon rampages and fragmentation.
Anyway, it just doesn't feel right to leave such a cute little guy in such a dangerous place!
Go back to your Farm for now, okay? I'm counting on you!
Is Vorvomon doing well?
Please take good care of it, okay? If you do, then...
Wh-what...?!? What in the world...??
I'm going to try to figure out what's going on!
Oh, my...!
Volcanicdramon is approaching the Farm as we speak!

It's making a beeline right for us!
Get ready for battle, quick!
Oh, no! Is it already that close?
Another alert!? What is it this time...?
Huh??
The data for the area around the Farm is being overwritten with data from the volcano zone!
It can't be... that's impossible! It's overwriting its own data environs!
This... this must be the true power of Volcanicdramon!
It'll be risky, but if you can chase Volcanicdramon away, I... I think I can still restore the data...
If we don't do something, sooner or later the whole Digital World will be overwritten!
You've got to fight it, for the sake of all Digimon!

I'll be right here to help, of course! Just leave it to me!
$USER_INPUT_NAME$, I'm counting on you!
$USER_INPUT_NAME$, I'm counting on you!

Hmm... What am I going to do?
This is serious...
Oh! Perfect timing, $USER_INPUT_NAME$! I was just hoping to see you!
The truth is, I've got a problem...

Some Palmon came to see me yesterday all excited about
looking for the legendary Cherrymon in the woods...
I was worried, so I looked up those woods, and they're in a dangerous area full of rampaging Digimon!
I tried to tell them it was too risky, but they wouldn't listen. They want to go, no matter what!
Huh? You've never heard of the legendary Cherrymon?

Oh! I'm sorry!
I didn't explain that, did I?
The legendary Cherrymon is a Cherrymon that's said to appear every year at about this time.
I don't know the details, but supposedly if you go under it in a pair, something good will happen. I think.
Those Palmon want to find out if the rumors are true, but it's just too dangerous...
Oh! I know! $USER_INPUT_NAME$, will you come with me to find that Cherrymon?
